org.oddjob.arooa.design.designer

Interface TransferEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface TransferEventListener
extends EventListener
    Listener for events from an ArooaTransferHandler. Currently the only notification is failure. Other events could be added if required.
    Author:
    rob

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transferException(TransferEvent event, String message, Exception exception)
      Transfer failed.

                     String message,
                     Exception exception)
        Transfer failed.
        Parameters:
        event - The event.
        message - The reason.
        exception - The underlying exception.
